languages.text: "Значит... кто-то все-таки выжил?" {n}Глаза эльдара наполняются надеждой, но она быстро угасает.{/n} "И попали на твой мир. Поведай же, мон-кай, какую судьбу встретили их бессмертные души вдали от дома, на землях чужаков".

traits.locale_text: "Значит... кто-то все-таки выжил?" {n}Глаза эльдара наполняются надеждой, но она быстро угасает.{/n} "И попали на твой мир. Поведай же, мон-кай, какую судьбу встретили их бессмертные души вдали от дома, на землях чужаков".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"
languages.original_text: "Значит... кто-то все-таки выжил?" {n}Глаза эльдара наполняются надеждой, но она быстро угасает.{/n} "И попали на твой мир. Поведай же, мон-кай, какую судьбу встретили их бессмертные души вдали от дома, на землях чужаков".

traits.locale_text: "So... someone survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Entonces... ¿hubo supervivientes, después de todo?». {n}Los ojos del Aeldari se llenan de esperanza, pero no tarda en desvanecerse.{/n} «Y han acabado en tu mundo. Dime, mon-keigh, ¿qué destino aguarda a sus almas inmortales en esas tierras forasteras, tan lejos de su hogar?».
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces... ¿hubo supervivientes, después de todo?». {n}Los ojos del Aeldari se llenan de esperanza, pero no tarda en desvanecerse.{/n} «Y han acabado en tu mundo. Dime, mon-keigh, ¿qué destino aguarda a sus almas inmortales en esas tierras forasteras, tan lejos de su hogar?».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「では…生き残った者もいたんだな？」{n}アエルダリの目に希望が満ちるが、それはすぐに消えた。{/n} 「そしてたどり着いたのは、お前たちの惑星だったのか。教えてくれ、モン＝ケイ、故郷から遠く離れた見知らぬ土地で、彼らの不滅の魂を待ち受けていたものは何だったのだ？」
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: 「では…生き残った者もいたんだな？」{n}アエルダリの目に希望が満ちるが、それはすぐに消えた。{/n} 「そしてたどり着いたのは、お前たちの惑星だったのか。教えてくれ、モン＝ケイ、故郷から遠く離れた見知らぬ土地で、彼らの不滅の魂を待ち受けていたものは何だったのだ？」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “也就是说……他们之中有人活了下来。”{n}艾达灵族的眼中充满了希望，但转瞬即逝。{/n}“而他们来到了你的世界。告诉我，猴子，在那片远离家乡的陌生土地上，等待他们不朽灵魂的，是怎样的命运？”
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说……他们之中有人活了下来。”{n}艾达灵族的眼中充满了希望，但转瞬即逝。{/n}“而他们来到了你的世界。告诉我，猴子，在那片远离家乡的陌生土地上，等待他们不朽灵魂的，是怎样的命运？”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Alors... Certains ont survécu ? » {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari est plein d'un espoir, qui s'éteint néanmoins l'instant d'après.{/n} « Et ils ont terminé sur votre monde. Dites-moi, mon-keigh, quel sort attendait leurs âmes immortelles dans ces étranges contrées si lointaines ? »
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors... Certains ont survécu ? » {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari est plein d'un espoir, qui s'éteint néanmoins l'instant d'après.{/n} « Et ils ont terminé sur votre monde. Dites-moi, mon-keigh, quel sort attendait leurs âmes immortelles dans ces étranges contrées si lointaines ? »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Also ... haben doch welche überlebt?" {n}In den Augen des Aeldari zeigt sich Hoffnung, die aber schnell wieder schwindet.{/n} "Und sie landeten auf Eurer Welt. Sagt mir, Chem-Pan-Sey, welches Schicksal ist ihren unsterblichen Seelen in diesen fremden Landen ereilt, so weit weg von ihrer Heimat?"
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: "Also ... haben doch welche überlebt?" {n}In den Augen des Aeldari zeigt sich Hoffnung, die aber schnell wieder schwindet.{/n} "Und sie landeten auf Eurer Welt. Sagt mir, Chem-Pan-Sey, welches Schicksal ist ihren unsterblichen Seelen in diesen fremden Landen ereilt, so weit weg von ihrer Heimat?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Nasıl?.. Her şeye rağmen sağ kalanlar mı olmuş?" {n}Aeldari'nin gözleri, çabucak sönen bir umutla doluyor.{/n} "Sonra da yolları senin dünyana düştü tabii. Söyle bakalım mon-keigh... Yuvalarından bu denli uzaktaki o tuhaf diyarda ölümsüz ruhlarının başına ne geldi?"
languages.original_text: "So... some survived after all?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes are filled with hope, only for it to fade quickly.{/n} "And they ended up on your world. Tell me, mon-keigh, what lot awaited their immortal souls in those strange lands so far from their home?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani... Her şeye rağmen hayatta kalanlar oldu, ha?" {n}Aeldari'nin gözleri, çabucak sönecek bir umutla doluyor.{/n} "Yollarıysa senin dünyana düştü. Söyle bakalım mon-keigh, yuvalarından bu denli uzaktaki o tuhaf diyarlarda ölümsüz ruhlarını nasıl bir yazgı bekliyordu?"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
